fraseIngles: The red rose smells beautiful.

fraseIngles: She chose bold red lipstick.

fraseIngles: The room has subtle color changes.

fraseIngles: Beige is a neutral color.
frasePortugues: Bege é uma cor neutra.

fraseIngles: Red and orange are warm colors.
frasePortugues: Vermelho e laranja são cores quentes.

fraseIngles: Blue and green are cool colors.
frasePortugues: Azul e verde são cores frias.

fraseIngles: Red, blue, and yellow are primary colors.
frasePortugues: Vermelho, azul e amarelo são cores primárias.

fraseIngles: Orange, green, and purple are secondary colors.
frasePortugues: Laranja, verde e roxo são cores secundárias.

fraseIngles: Red and green are complementary colors.
frasePortugues: Vermelho e verde são cores complementares.

fraseIngles: Blue and green are analogous colors.
frasePortugues: Azul e verde são cores análogas.

fraseIngles: The room uses a monochromatic color scheme.
frasePortugues: O quarto usa esquema de cores monocromático.

fraseIngles: The rainbow shows all colors.
frasePortugues: O arco-íris mostra todas as cores.

fraseIngles: Light creates a color spectrum.

fraseIngles: The hue changes from red to orange.
frasePortugues: O matiz muda de vermelho para laranja.

fraseIngles: This shade of blue is darker.
frasePortugues: Este tom de azul é mais escuro.

fraseIngles: Add white to create a lighter tint.
frasePortugues: Adicione branco para criar uma nuance mais clara.

fraseIngles: The painting has a warm tone.
frasePortugues: A pintura tem uma tonalidade quente.

fraseIngles: Artists mix pigments to create colors.
frasePortugues: Artistas misturam pigmentos para criar cores.

fraseIngles: The fabric is colored with natural dye.

fraseIngles: Mix different paints to get new colors.

fraseIngles: The painting has balanced colors.
